item.title: Because i got high, because i got high, because i got high
item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Roses are red, but then I got high, I got high
Violets are blue (Yeah motherfucker) but then I got high
And now I’m fucked with a rake, and I know why; because I got high, because I got high, because I got high

I was gonna post something good, but then I got high
I was gonna hit cancel too, but then I got high
Now you’re reading this shit, because I hit submit, and I know why. Because I got high, because I got high, because I got high.

item.dc:creator: @Greeny Greeny
item.description:
@Greeny wrote:

i was coding a decent 'scape server, but then i got high
i used mdogs perfect compiler, because i was high
now my client.java is 50kb and i know why, because i got high, because i got high, because i got high

i was going to improve my code, until i got high
instead im using antilag voids, because i got high
now i need 16gb ram to run this shit and i know why, because i got high, because i got high because i got higghhhh

there was 30 people online, before i got high
now i kickbanned them all, because im high
i have a feeling its all going to crash and i know why, because i got high, because i got high, because i got high.

I have not said it is a coding you f dumb noob, until i got high
I made the tut… and I posted in this section, because i was high
well idc… I HAVE NOT SAID IT IS A FUCKING CODING and i know why, ye, ye, because i got high, because i got high, because i got high

WHAT THE HELL YOU LITTLE STUPID LITTLE SCUM FAGS AND IF YOU SEE THE WEBSITE GO DOWN THAT WILL HIGHLY LIKELY BE ME!!!, but then i got high
Im looking for my underground hacking tools, because im high
Its a program dumbass noobs - and i know why, because i got high, because i got high, because i got high

KM93 had a wank and didn’t know what to do, because he got high
now his bros coming up the stairs, while he’s still high
he applied his cum directly to forehead and i know why, because he was high, because he was high, and because sensored was higgh.
